content: <collection xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim">    <dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:invenio="http://invenio-software.org/elements/1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd"><dc:identifier>doi:10.5281/zenodo.15835</dc:identifier><dc:creator>Mon\ufffd\ufffd, Martijn</dc:creator><dc:creator>Westerhoff, Hans</dc:creator><dc:creator>Regierer, Babette</dc:creator><dc:creator>van Driel, Roel</dc:creator><dc:creator>van Nieuwpoort, Frans</dc:creator><dc:creator>Skene, Barbara</dc:creator><dc:creator>Hermjakob, Henning</dc:creator><dc:creator>Le Nov\ufffd\ufffdre, Nicolas</dc:creator><dc:creator>Goble, Carole</dc:creator><dc:creator>Wolstencroft, Katy</dc:creator><dc:title>ISBE - draft proposal on connections</dc:title><dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject><dc:description><p>This report presents&nbsp; recommendations for&nbsp; what&nbsp; the connections &nbsp;in the&nbsp; infrastructure should&nbsp; comprise&nbsp; and&nbsp; how&nbsp; they should be structured&nbsp; in&nbsp; order to best serve&nbsp; the&nbsp; above&nbsp; purpose. It defines interfaces&nbsp; at ISBE&nbsp; nodes&nbsp; that&nbsp; enable R&amp;D activities to integrate seamlessly.&nbsp; Connections&nbsp; include&nbsp; computer\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdonly, computer-&shy;assisted&nbsp; and&nbsp; human&shy;\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdhuman interactions. This document also defines&nbsp; ways&nbsp; in which&nbsp; large systems biology&nbsp; tasks&nbsp; can&nbsp; be&nbsp; optimally&nbsp; partitioned over&nbsp; activities&nbsp; that&nbsp; can&nbsp; best&nbsp; be&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; accomplished at&nbsp; ISBE&nbsp; nodes,&nbsp; whilst&nbsp; enabling &nbsp;optimal&nbsp; continuous&nbsp; integration&nbsp; through&nbsp; the&nbsp; connections.</p>  <p>Through&nbsp; ISBE, large&nbsp; systems biology-&shy;\ufffd\ufffd\ufffddriven community efforts become&nbsp; feasible by connecting the expertise and resources of multiple different projects in past and present. This builds ISBE as a platform from which to launch large-&shy;\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdscale integrative visionary projects with great scientific and societal impact.</p></dc:description><dc:publisher/><dc:date>2014-02-04</dc:date><dc:source>http://zenodo.org/record/15835</dc:source><dc:doi>10.5281/zenodo.15835</dc:doi><dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/15835</dc:identifier><dc:identifier>oai:zenodo.org:15835</dc:identifier></dc:dc>   </collection>
